- Location: Ceiling drywall with orange-peel texture; centered stain in living area. 
- Observations: Circular moisture stain ~6â€“8 inches; dark center with lighter halo; no active drip visible.
- Condition: Suspected moisture intrusion; potential mold growth in center; discoloration around area.
- Likely cause: Past roof or plumbing leak from above; needs source verification in attic/above ceiling.
- Recommended action: Locate and repair leak, dry-out area, replace damaged drywall, treat any mold, and re-paint.
